title: Artichoke, Mushroom and Parma Ham Tart
ingredients: ['225g sifted plain flour', '50g grated Parmesan cheese', '150g butter, diced', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '75g Parma ham', '1/2 (400g) tin artichoke hearts, drained', '200g creme fraiche', '4 eggs', '1 teaspoon chopped flat leaf parsley', '5 tablespoons milk', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
